content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-0.5, -9.5)
- Boiler at position(-4.5, 23.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
- Small electric poles at various positions:
  - Position(-5.5, 15.5)
  - Position(-4.5, 17.5)
  - Position(-6.5, 15.5)
  - Position(-13.5, 17.5)
  - Position(-7.5, 18.5)
  - Position(-6.5, 19.5)
  - Position(-5.5, 19.5)
  - Position(-4.5, 21.5)
  - Position(-16.5, 22.5)
  - Position(-8.5, 23.5)
  - Position(-7.5, 22.5)
  - Position(-15.5, 25.5)
  - Position(-11.5, 26.5)
  - Position(-16.5, 18.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(0, 0) and a furnace at position(0, 0)
- Burner mining drill at position(5, 5) and a furnace at position(5, 5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure there are no obstructions in the path when attempting to connect pipes between entities. Clear any pipes or objects that may block the connection.

### Errors when using electricity
- Verify that all electric entities are properly connected to the electric network. Check the positions of small electric poles and ensure they are within range of the entities they are meant to power.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the intended placement area.

### Errors related to fluid connections
- Confirm that the offshore pump has a valid fluid connection and that there are no blockages preventing fluid flow. Check the surrounding pipe connections for any issues.
